languages.text:
This creature leaps toward the target, moving up to several cells, and smashes that target with its tail. If this attack hits, the target must pass an Agility resistance test with a −40 penalty or be knocked {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g} and {g|f:4397f91671007c5488e9787f5c0e6541}stunned{/g}
for 1 round.

for 1 round.

languages.text: This creature leaps toward the target and smashes the target with its tail. If this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: A swift jump with a tail push several cells towards the target of the attack. If the attack hits, that character must make a DC 40 Dexterity check or be knocked prone and stunned for 1 round.

languages.text: La criatura salta hacia el objetivo y lo aporrea con su cola. Si el ataque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g}, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −40 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature leaps toward the target and smashes the target with its tail. If this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La criatura salta hacia el objetivo y lo aporrea con su cola. Si el ataque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g}, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −40 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: この生物はターゲットに向かってジャンプして、ターゲットにその尾を叩きつける。この攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}当たった{/g}場合、ターゲットが−40{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、突き飛ばされて{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect} 脆弱化{/g}状態になり、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: This creature leaps toward the target and smashes the target with its tail. If this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物はターゲットに向かってジャンプして、ターゲットにその尾を叩きつける。この攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}当たった{/g}場合、ターゲットが−40{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、突き飛ばされて{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect} 脆弱化{/g}状態になり、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}になる。

languages.text: 猛地跃向目标，用尾巴猛击目标。若此次攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}，则目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-40{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会被{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}，并陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: This creature leaps toward the target and smashes the target with its tail. If this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 猛地跃向目标，用尾巴猛击目标。若此次攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}，则目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-40{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会被{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}，并陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Diese Kreatur springt auf das Ziel zu und schlägt es mit ihrem Schwanz. Wenn dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, wird das Ziel nach einer misslungenen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −40 {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g} und ist 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature leaps toward the target and smashes the target with its tail. If this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur springt auf das Ziel zu und schlägt es mit ihrem Schwanz. Wenn dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, wird das Ziel nach einer misslungenen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -40 {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g} und ist 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}.

languages.text: Cette créature bondit vers la cible et la frappe de sa queue. Si cette attaque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} sa cible, cette dernière doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −40. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et devient {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Si cette attaque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} sa cible, cette dernière doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −40. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et devient {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Существо совершает прыжок к цели и наносит по ней удар хвостом. При {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} цель совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −40 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушена{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

Существо совершает прыжок к цели и наносит по ней удар хвостом. languages.text: Bu yaratık, hedefe doğru sıçrar ve ona kuyruğunu savurur. Bu saldırı {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurursa{/g} hedef, −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilir{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemler{/g}. Bu etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
